live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.

Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!

45477.summary: Some customers in-between North Nanaimo St and Hastings Park are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45477.title: Dec 30 - Vancouver (West of Hastings Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
